originalText.text: Dr Kronenberg is the best Ophthalmologist I have ever been too! He is very knowledgeable and very kind! He just wants the best for you and your vision! I respect him a lot and for sure if you have him as a doc, you will see the care he has for his patient! Thank you Dr K for giving me a detailed examination and giving the best options so my vision can be at its best!üíØ

originalText.text: Booked the appointment through Zocdoc and went to the office not knowing that it has been cancelled by the office. The staff took me in so I never found out until later that the appointment was canceled. Not a biggy! However, before the exam I found out that though eye exam was covered through insurance, ‚Äúeye sight check up‚Äù will cost me a $100 copay. It came as a surprise because with my insurance (1199 SEIU) I never have to make copayments. Since I had already made the trip, I decided to go ahead with everything. Really would‚Äôve appreciated, if the office had told me about the copay in advance. Dr. Kronenberg is an excellent Ophthalmologist.

The staff took me in so I never found out until later that the appointment was canceled. Not a biggy! Really would‚Äôve appreciated, if the office had told me about the copay in advance. Dr. Kronenberg is an excellent Ophthalmologist.

originalText.text: Dr Kronenberg‚Äôs receptionist was able to squeeze me into his schedule on a day I was having extraordinary and unexpected vision issues. The doctor saw me without much wait time and spent a solid 40 minutes thoroughly examining my eyes to troubleshoot my condition. He was patient and methodical, explaining various aspects of the exam and vision function. Dr Kronenberg went out of his way to quickly check with professional colleagues in other practices to identify an appropriate referral. I am appreciative of the care I received, and easily recommend Dr Kronenberg‚Äôs practice.

originalText.text: I went to Dr. Kronenberg for a regular eye exam and to get new prescriptions for glasses and contacts. He was professional and kind. I felt comfortable throughout the appointment. I would highly recommend him to anyone.

text.text: I went to Dr. Kronenberg for a regular eye exam and to get new prescriptions for glasses and contacts. He was professional and kind. I felt comfortable throughout the appointment. I would highly recommend him to anyone.

originalText.text: After experiencing excruciating pain in my left eye, I was desperate for relief. I made a last minute ZocDoc appointment, and Dr. Kronenburg was the only ophthalmologist available the following day. He assessed my situation and gave me an immediate diagnosis, which was pretty serious (corneal ulcer). He is highly knowledgeable and had no qualms explaining the science behind its cause; I am highly inquisitive and always appreciate doctors who explain in detail. This is my first time writing a review, but I felt it was warranted because my experience, and the care I received, was beyond exceptional! A bonus is that Dr. Kronenburg is full of stories + wisdom.
